mng: knife, blade, single-edged sword, cutlass, (slang) dollar (loanword), classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper), classifier for knife cuts or stabs

exm.mng: lit. to cut all at one stroke (idiom); to impose uniformity, one solution fits a diversity of problems, one size fits all
(of a surgeon) to perform an operation, (of a patient) to have an operation, to decapitate, to behead, to single out as a point of attack
the edge of a knife, cut, incision
sickle, curved blade to cut grain
Dolan, a people of the Tarim Basin, Xinjiang, also known as 多郎
